item.title: About
item.description: We worship hping, we hate AI. Born during ITS Alto Adriatico, Network Sniffers is a work group, a CTF team and a group of friends with various interests all related to machines. Members Riccardo Temporin (@BluePsyc0) Luca Loner (@LL1201) Michele Pitton (@GamaKichi) Federico Lorenzon (@LaRancion)
